sponsorCapitalFactory: Thank you to Capital Factory for sponsoring Austin Producer Alliance. Capital Factory is the center of gravity for entrepreneurs in Texas. They meet the best entrepreneurs in Texas and introduce them to their first investors, employees, mentors, and customers. To sign up for a Capital Factory coworking membership,
summary: Our mission is to build a strong community of music producers across metro Austin. We help connect and educate those passionate about creating music digitally. We want the platform to be a space where people from different musical backgrounds can come and form genuine relationships. We host meetups that cater to a variety of networking and educational opportunities.
